channel.title: 317 Shilo-Nation the way servers should be
channel.description:
[center][img]http://shilo-nation.com/style/img/SN.png[/img]
ShiloNation v3, is out and online running 100% 24/7 at [url=http://shilo-nation.com]Shilo-Nation[/url]
[url=http://shilo-nation.com/play.php?world=1][img]http://s8.postimg.org/kb6e5ky4l/image.png[/img][/url] [url=http://shilo-nation.com][img]http://s16.postimg.org/imdub761h/image.png[/img][/url] [url=http://forum.shilo-nation.com][img]http://s23.postimg.org/k1wl6q1ej/image.png[/img][/url] [size=4][font=comic sans ms][b][u]DOUBLE XP WeekEND ! JOIN NOW DONT MISS THE CHANCE[/u][/b][/font][/size]
Quick Links : [url=http://shilo-nation.com/]Website[/url] [url=http://shilo-nation.com/play.php?world=1]PlayNow[/url] [url=http://forum.shilo-nation.com/]Forums[/url] [b][size=15pt][font=verdana]Features:[/font][/size][/b] - FULL Curses have been added! - Full and flawless dicing and gambling! - Full and flawless staking at the Duel Arena! - Full and flawless Bank PIN system to keep your items safe! - First ever fully operational Grand Exchange system! - First ever fully flawless operational Drop Party Room! - Proper combat, hybriding suppot with F-Keys! - New and updated items always being added such as handcannons, and chaotic staffs! - Lottery, win big or go home! - Perfected name changing system! - Perfected donator crown changing, with tons of options! - Loyalty titles, pre-set and custom titles! - Custom stores such as PvP Stores, Slayer Stores, and Donor Stores! - Generous PvP drop tables ranging from artifacts to chaotic items! - Proper curse prayers! - Tutorial on login to easily orient yourself! - Proper clue scrolls and full puzzle boxes! - Proper item effects such as Spirit Shields, including all special attacks! - Proper banking with new banking features such as live searching and a money bag! - Great and stable economy, promising an enjoyable playing experience! - Perfectly accurate leaderboards so you can always track your progress to fame! - Great PvP and PvM on both of our worlds with tons of challenges! - Great community with a full website and forums to ensure you're never alone! - and many other smaller features. - Summoning skill 100% working
Alot more can't even mention quarter of them.
Animated Pictures : [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/ht5ser.gif[/img]
Why should you join us? Our server is based on development progress and challenging obstacles, if you're looking for a server that have constant updates everyday and fixes, and tend to perfection wait no longer and join us :) , our staff team is very friendly and also we listen to our players suggestions and opinions if you like/dislike something there is chance of it being changed all you gotta do is express your opinion with us and we will inform you what will happen in the future, we give our players the chance of testing a server that tends more to fun of playing more than other servers that tend to get your money, we only use our donations to upgrade the server and to advertise it.
If you would like to support us please leave an comment below you will be appreciated :) [/center]

item.title: 317 Shilo-Nation the way servers should be
item.dc:creator: @CarScape CarScape
item.description:
@CarScape wrote:

Elrick:

I never got an answer on your xp rate compared to regular RS. Also, I would suggest downloading GIMP Image Editor and selecting the items you do not want viewed and then using a blur multiple times to avoid using black squares, it helps look more professional :). You can also just click the public button and it will go blank :P.

Lol man, xp rate is X10, I could use Photoshop but i was lazy so I used paint really quick

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:14, topic:505032”]I understand why you blocked out your ip, but why your username? I’m sure whoever plays this will find out your username lol.[/quote]I blocked it just for funs lol My username in game is Anan.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Shilo-Nation the way servers should be
item.dc:creator: @CarScape CarScape
item.description:
@CarScape wrote:

we are currently having web host issues, as our webhosting company made a mistake with our host after 3 years of working with them they left our domain inactive until it expired, and now it needs 48 Hours to update back to all DNS and work as it should again, sorry for this inconvenience, but if you’re not able to connect try accessing after a few mins and restart browser.

Edit : New Update 6/6/2013 Tormented Demons. Join now and test the new beasts 100% working.

Read full topic
